WorkflowStrategy.workflow_description: When a user submits a dream description, workflow processes the input to generate a high-definition video representation and provides psychoanalytic insights if premium features are enabled, resulting in an immersive psychological visualization.

phases.phase_description: Collect user's dream input and determine if psychoanalytic insights should be included based on subscription level and user preferences.
Generate a vivid, high-definition video of the user's dream using AI generative tools.
Analyze dream symbols and themes to produce a psychoanalytic report if the user has a premium subscription, then deliver the visualization with insights.

global_context_variables.name: dream_input
global_context_variables.purpose: Stores the user's dream input for processing in visualization and analysis phases

global_context_variables.name: include_psychoanalysis
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: Set based on user subscription and preferences
global_context_variables.purpose: Determines whether to perform psychoanalytic analysis in Phase 3

global_context_variables.name: dream_visualization_status
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: Update after Dream Visualization Processing completes
global_context_variables.purpose: Tracks progress and status of dream video generation

global_context_variables.name: psychoanalysis_report_ready
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: Set to true when psychoanalytic report is generated
global_context_variables.purpose: Indicates readiness of insights for delivery in final phase

global_context_variables.name: user_subscription_tier
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: Loaded from user account data before workflow starts
global_context_variables.purpose: Determines access to premium psychoanalytic insights

ui_components.label: Enter Your Dream Description
ui_components.summary: A simple inline form where user types or speaks their dream description and submits.

ui_components.label: View Dream Visualization
ui_components.summary: Displays the generated dream video as a rich artifact for review and download.

ui_components.label: View Psychoanalytic Insights
ui_components.summary: User reviews detailed psychoanalytic report alongside the visualized dream, with options for feedback and exploration.

before_chat_lifecycle.name: initialize_user_workflow_context
before_chat_lifecycle.purpose: Set up initial context variables and validate user subscription tier before workflow begins.

after_chat_lifecycle.name: finalize_dream_session
after_chat_lifecycle.purpose: Persist user dream history and send follow-up notifications or emails after workflow completion.

agents.description: Collects user-submitted dream descriptions, capturing input via form or voice for processing in subsequent phases.

agent_tools.name: collect_dream_input
agent_tools.purpose: Retrieve user's dream narrative for visualization and analysis purposes.

lifecycle_tools.name: initialize_user_workflow_context
lifecycle_tools.purpose: Initialize context variables and validate user subscription tier before starting workflow.

agents.description: Generates a vivid, high-definition video of the user's dream utilizing generative AI tools, providing an immersive visual experience.

agent_tools.name: generate_dream_video
agent_tools.purpose: Create a visual, HD video of the dream based on user input.

lifecycle_tools.name: persist_dream_visualization_status
lifecycle_tools.purpose: Update workflow state to reflect progress of visual generation.

agents.description: Performs psychoanalytic analysis of dream symbols and themes, generating a detailed report if the user has a premium subscription, then facilitates delivery of insights alongside the visualization.

agent_tools.name: deliver_psychoanalysis_report
agent_tools.purpose: Analyze dream symbols, themes, and generate psychoanalytic insights.

lifecycle_tools.name: finalize_dream_session
lifecycle_tools.purpose: Persist user dream history and send notifications or follow-up emails.

MermaidSequenceDiagram.mermaid_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant InputAgent as Input Agent
    participant VisualizationAgent as Visualization Agent
    participant AnalysisAgent as Analysis Agent

    Note over User,InputAgent: Phase 0: Initial User Input Collection
    User->>InputAgent: Enter Your Dream Description
    InputAgent->>InputAgent: Collect and store dream input

    Note over InputAgent,VisualizationAgent: Phase 1: Dream Visualization Processing
    InputAgent->>VisualizationAgent: Trigger dream video generation
    VisualizationAgent->>VisualizationAgent: Generate HD dream video
    VisualizationAgent->>User: Display dreams as artifact

    Note over VisualizationAgent,AnalysisAgent: Phase 2: Psychoanalytic Analysis & Insight Delivery
    VisualizationAgent->>AnalysisAgent: Send dream symbols for analysis
    AnalysisAgent->>AnalysisAgent: Generate psychoanalytic report
    AnalysisAgent->>User: Share insights with visualization

    Note over InputAgent,VisualizationAgent,AnalysisAgent: Finalize workflow and persist data

output.agent_message: Review the detailed workflow above and approve to proceed with automation.

WorkflowStrategy.workflow_description: When a user requests to automate dream visualization, workflow processes the user's dream description, generates visualizations, and optionally provides psychoanalytic insights, resulting in a high-definition video and analysis report.

phases.phase_description: Collect user's dream narrative details via chat interface.
Use AI tools to create high-definition visual representation of the dream.
If selected, analyze dream symbols and themes for psychological insights.
Present the video and analysis report to the user for feedback or further requests.

global_context_variables.name: dream_text
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: User submits dream description in Phase 1
global_context_variables.purpose: Stores the user's dream narrative input to be used in visualization and analysis.

global_context_variables.name: visualization_video_url
global_context_variables.purpose: Stores the URL of the created high-definition dream visualization video.

global_context_variables.name: psychoanalysis_report
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: Generated after psychoanalytic analysis if selected
global_context_variables.purpose: Contains insights and thematic analysis of the dream for user review.

global_context_variables.name: user_feedback
global_context_variables.purpose: Tracks user satisfaction and requests for further action.

global_context_variables.name: dream_analysis_required
global_context_variables.trigger_hint: Set based on user selection of analysis feature
global_context_variables.purpose: Determines if psychoanalytic analysis should be performed.

ui_components.label: Enter your dream description
ui_components.summary: User sees a chat inline form to input their dream description and submits it for processing.

ui_components.label: Create Dream Visualization
ui_components.summary: An artifact shows progress of video generation; user waits for high-definition visualization.

ui_components.label: View Psychoanalytic Insights
ui_components.summary: User reviews the detailed psychoanalytic report with visual highlights of symbols and themes.

ui_components.label: Provide Feedback
ui_components.summary: Inline feedback form to gather user impressions and additional requests.

agents.description: Collects user's dream description via an inline form and initiates processing.

agent_tools.name: collect_dream_input
agent_tools.purpose: Gather user dream description input for visualization and analysis validation.

agents.description: Generates a high-definition visual representation of the user's dream using AI tools.

agent_tools.name: generate_dream_video
agent_tools.purpose: Create the dream visualization video from user's input.

agents.description: Performs psychoanalytic analysis on the dream symbols and themes, providing insights and interpreting narratives.

agent_tools.name: analyze_dream_symbols
agent_tools.purpose: Analyze dream symbols and themes for psychological insights.

agents.description: Collects user feedback on the visualization and analysis report for further refinement or follow-up.

agent_tools.name: collect_user_feedback
agent_tools.purpose: Gather user satisfaction data and requests for additional actions.

MermaidSequenceDiagram.mermaid_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant InputAgent as Input Agent
    participant VisualizationAgent as Visualization Agent
    participant AnalysisAgent as Analysis Agent
    participant FeedbackAgent as Feedback Agent

    Note over User,Input Agent: Phase 0: Collect User Dream Description
    User->>Input Agent: Enter your dream description
    Input Agent->>Input Agent: Store dream description

    Note over Input Agent,Visualization Agent: Phase 1: Generate Dream Visualization
    Input Agent->>Visualization Agent: Request high-def dream video
    VisualizationAgent->>VisualizationAgent: Generate the video

    Note over Visualization Agent,Analysis Agent: Phase 2: Psychoanalytic Analysis
    alt User opts in
        Visualization Agent->>Analysis Agent: Send symbols for analysis
        Analysis Agent->>Analysis Agent: Generate psychoanalytic report
    else User skips
        Analysis Agent->>Analysis Agent: Bypass analysis
    end

    Note over Analysis Agent,Feedback Agent: Phase 3: Delivery & Feedback
    Analysis Agent->>Feedback Agent: Send analysis report
    Feedback Agent->>User: Present visualization & report
    User->>Feedback Agent: Provide feedback

    Note over Feedback Agent,User: Feedback session complete

output.agent_message: Review the sequence diagram and approve to proceed with the automation build.
